job_tasks.phrase: develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation of the user interface and interactive elements of a new product, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs)
job_tasks.justification: While mentioning AI technologies, the context is about leveraging them within the product development, indicating the application of these technologies in a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content
job_tasks.justification: This sentence describes the overarching business goal and the purpose of the team's work, which is to enhance user experience and drive business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the existing products and the future direction of the team, indicating an understanding of the business's product landscape and strategic initiatives.

job_tasks.phrase: conversational search solution. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs).
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'conversational search solution' and leveraging 'generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs)' points to the underlying AI models that power the product, even though the primary role is front-end development.

soft_skills.phrase: The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier.
Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product
Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development and product user experience, with only a mention of leveraging generative AI and LLMs. The core responsibilities and tasks do not align with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer, which involve building, fine-tuning, and deploying AI models or systems.
